# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(AVSucd_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(AVSucd)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
AVSucdPluginInfo.C
AVSucdCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
AVSucdPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
AVSucdMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtAVSucdFileFormat.C
VisItAVSucdReader.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
AVSucdEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtAVSucdFileFormat.C
VisItAVSucdReader.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IAVSucdDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IAVSucdDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IAVSucdDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MAVSucdDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MAVSucdDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MAVSucdDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MAVSucdDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EAVSucdDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EAVSucdDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EAVSucdDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EAVSucdDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EAVSucdDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EAVSucdDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EAVSucdDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EAVSucdDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases AVSucd ${INSTALLTARGETS})
